articles.title: London Marathon 2022: Man dies after collapsing during event - BBC
articles.description: The 36-year-old man became unwell between miles 23 and 24 of the annual 26.2-mile event.
articles.content:
A 36-year-old man died after collapsing while running the London Marathon, organisers have confirmed.
The man, from south-east England, became unwell between miles 23 and 24 of the 26.2-mile event.… [+658 chars]
